changelog_text:
**What's New in v1.8.3:**

**Changes:**
• Show translated messages inline
• Hide "via {bot}" caption when using inline bots (works with only media)
• Show owned channel/group like TDesktop
• Remove chat from all folders before leaving like TDesktop
• Bookmark messages ~ inspired from @NagramX
• Return recent chats manager
• Custom privacy for each users ~ inspired from @OctoGramApp
• Show emoji keyboard for selecting pinned reactions

**Bug Fixes:**
• Use proper delegates for each forward mode
• Fix mutual contact cells calculation
• Skip story replies in send_comments_after_forward
• Fixed an issue where available languages are not showing
• Wrap all activity using weakref
